com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.query.types

Interface StructType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSerializable, ObjectType, java.io.Serializable

    public interface StructType
extends ObjectType
    Describes the field names and types for each field in a Struct.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.gemstone.gemfire.DataSerializable
